name: red-chain
short_effect: Used to bind Palkia and Dialga.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
